product_name: Coleman Triton Series Mossy Oak 2-Burner Stove
long_description: Cook breakfast, lunch and dinner with the legendary durability of a Coleman TritonTM Series Mossy Oak 2-Burner Stove. It's ideal for camping, tailgating and outdoor cooking during power outtages.
short_description: Cook breakfast, lunch and dinner with the legendary durability of a Coleman TritonTM Series Mossy Oak 2-Burner Stove. It's ideal for camping, tailgating and outdoor cooking during power outtages.
